about.title: About Me
about.h1: I am Elderson Luciano Mezzomo, a passionate and creative Frontend Developer
about.text: With a focus on JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. With my experience in team leadership and analytical thinking, I bring a unique combination of technical skills and a creative problem-solving approach to the IT industry. My career path has taken me from the humanities to my passion for exact sciences and technology, where I have gained extensive knowledge in frontend development. With continuous education in modern frameworks like React.js, I strive to further develop my technical skills in a dynamic and innovative environment. I am ready to make a lasting contribution to the development of digital solutions and improve my skills within a dedicated team.

project1.desc: The website for the 'Nuray Bal' hair salon in Marburg was developed to showcase the salon's services and atmosphere in an appealing and user-friendly manner.
project1.html: HTML: Use of semantic HTML5 for clear, accessible structure and implementation of a video embed on the homepage.
project1.css: CSS: Flexible techniques with CSS variables for a consistent color and design palette, responsive to different screen sizes. Transition effects for a smooth user experience.
project1.js: JavaScript: Dynamic language switching and customizable header elements to enhance user experience.
project1.conclusion: Conclusion: This project demonstrates my ability to create professional and user-friendly websites using modern web technologies.

project2.desc: Schlafklang is an interactive web application that helps users create a calming sleep environment by selecting a countdown timer, background video, and music of their choice.
project2.html: HTML: Clear structuring of options (timer, background, and music) for intuitive operation.
project2.css: CSS: Minimalist design with dark colors and subtle animations to support a relaxing atmosphere. Flexibility through CSS variables.
project2.js: JavaScript: Controls volume and fullscreen mode based on remaining time, providing a seamless user experience.
project2.conclusion: Conclusion: Schlafklang demonstrates my skills in developing interactive and user-centered web applications that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

project3.desc: Central CAIXA brings together all apps, social networks, and support channels of CAIXA ECONÃ”MICA FEDERAL in one place. The app aims to reduce digital barriers, especially for users with limited digital skills.
project3.html: HTML: Well-structured sections that allow intuitive navigation between apps, websites, and social networks.
project3.css: CSS: Color distinction between installed and non-installed apps for visual guidance, supported by CSS animations and transitions.
project3.js: JavaScript: Detects installed apps on the user's device and seamlessly integrates them with the corresponding app stores for downloads.
project3.conclusion: Social Responsibility: This project promotes digital inclusion and makes it easier for all users to access important services.
project3.conclusionFinal: Conclusion: Central CAIXA showcases my ability to develop user-friendly and inclusive applications that provide social value.
